entry.title: RAINFALL WARNING , Sarnia
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:16 AM EST Tuesday 03 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mist, 2.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Sarnia Chris Hadfield Airport 06:29 AM EST Tuesday 03 January 2023
Condition: Mist
Temperature: 2.4°C
Pressure: 101.2 kPa
Visibility: 2.4 km
Humidity: 96 %
Dewpoint: 1.8°C
Wind: NE 9 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Tuesday: Rain at times heavy. High plus 5.
entry.summary: Rain at times heavy ending early this afternoon then cloudy with 60 percent chance of rain or drizzle. Risk of a thunderstorm this morning. Amount 20 to 30 mm. High plus 5. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Tuesday 03 January 2023
